title: Mistress to a Tycoon
description: Fleur had steeled herself to be cool toward Kit Malone, the powerful Australian tycoon who'd taken over the company. His reputation was formidable, but in the flesh Kit was sinfully sexy. Within hours of her new boss entering the boardroom, Fleur was swept into a whirlwind weekend of seductive passion..Back a work forty-eight hours later, both knew they wanted more. Professional colleagues by day, at night their affair became addictive, all-consuming. Only, Fleur didn't want to be a secret mistress. Was that all Kit intended?
author: Emma Darcy
